name: olio.llm.promptSection
label: Prompt Section
description: A composable section within a prompt template. Each section has a name, content lines, and optional conditions.

fields.name: role
fields.description: Role override for this section (system, user, assistant). If empty, inherits from parent template.

fields.name: lines
fields.description: Template content lines for this section. Supports ${...} token replacement.

fields.name: condition
fields.description: Condition expression evaluated against chatConfig. If empty, section is always included. Examples: 'useNLP', 'rating==AO||rating==RC', '!useJailBreak', 'episodes.size>0'

fields.name: priority
fields.description: Sort priority when sectionOrder is not specified. Lower values come first.
